title: The Secret Dinners Where Marijuana Is in Every Dish
description: Adventurous chefs are hosting semi-clandestine dinners that incorporate cannabis. Does it impart a unique flavor? Or is it there for the buzz?
dc:creator: Robert Simonson
media:credit: Gabby Jones for The New York Times
media:description: Chef Miguel Trinidad has been on the forefront of the cannabis dinner scene since 2015.
